Source.Name: feh
Source.Summary: feh is an X11 image viewer aimed mostly at console users.
Source.Description: feh is an X11 image viewer aimed mostly at console users. Unlike most other viewers, it does not have a fancy GUI, but simply displays images. It is controlled via commandline arguments and configurable key/mouse actions.

Package.Name: feh
Package.Summary: feh is an X11 image viewer aimed mostly at console users.
Package.Description: feh is an X11 image viewer aimed mostly at console users. Unlike most other viewers, it does not have a fancy GUI, but simply displays images. It is controlled via commandline arguments and configurable key/mouse actions.
